trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around March 26th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile on vacation in Orlando, Fl. with my friends, my friends and I were relaxing in the hot tub enjoying our frozen fruity cocktails trying to ease away the tension our children caused us when we visited Disney World. We were on our fourth or fifth cocktail when all of a sudden we heard what we can only describe as an "Earth Shattering Kaboom" followed by seeing an object traveling low in the sky from west to east too rapidly to be an airplane. My friends assured me that I was not seeing things and that they too heard the loud "kaboom" noise. While we are confident that this event will be thoroughly investigated by your organization, we feel obligated to inform you that we have both video and photographic evidence of this event and we shall not be ignored. Thank you for your diligent work in solving these mysteries. Na-nu, Na-nu.
Summary: lound earth shattering kaboom followed by sighting of two rapidly traveling lights low in the sky going west to east.
